page.title: 01 Housing,Transport,Industry.
page.content: The information contained in these pages covers the expanded villages of Seaton Burn,Dudley,Annitsford,and part of Cramlington New Town.The area is nearly all found within the Metropolitan Borough of North Tyneside. For major planning purposes the area is controlled by Tyne and Wear County Council. The main villages are now within a green belt area,which has been designed to control the urban expansion of Newcastle.Nearby Killingworth Township and Cramlington have housed some of the overspill population from inner city redevelopment schemes in Newcastle. Fast road connections feed traffic to the major suburban
